replies.msg: The problem is like that, this year Christmas, because my now bf is busy on working，no time陪i，and suddenly my old bf app me he can payme a free trip to台灣，he said different room ge, so i go with him. However, on the Christmas day, me and him drink a lot, me好似不由自主地跟him sleep jor。He "centre out" me, me very worry because me and now bf有plan結婚，very worry he know then唔要小妹，now my question is if today me back hong kong and go to藥房buy“things back pill”，will it still有效kill his sperms？(P.S. seriously ask, please no plastic reply.)
